name: Amazon FSx for Windows File Server
short: A fully managed native Microsoft Windows file system service by AWS that provides reliable and scalable file storage.
description: Amazon FSx for Windows File Server is a fully managed service that provides cost-effective, highly reliable file storage. It is built on Windows Server, delivering a wide range of administrative features such as user quotas and end-user file restores. It supports the SMB protocol, Active Directory integration, and Distributed File System. It can handle high-performance computing, web serving, content management, and more. With automatic backups and data encryption, it ensures robust data security and reliability.
